title: The After Show Asks Nestor Miranda About the 2019 Cigar of the Year Contenders
itunes:title: The After Show Asks Nestor Miranda About the 2019 Cigar of the Year Contenders
description:
This week Nestor Miranda joins The After Show.  How does Nestor like his chances of winning the coveted Cigar of the Year?  The After show is brought to you by Roma Craft Tobac.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
